content: निर्वह् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To carry out, extricate oneself. {@--2@} To be finished. {@--3@} To live upon, live by the aid of. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To take to the end of, complete, finish, manage; यथा प्रियसखी बंधुजनशोचनीया न भवति तथा निर्वाहय <ls>Ś. 3.</ls> {@--2@} To carry out, accomplish, effect. {@--3@} To pass, spend (as time).
